demo.introduction: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

home.btn_mint_tooltip: Minting an NFT-Username is the new way to enter to a revolutionary world. Join us!
home.blockchain_label: Blockchain is a shared, immutable ledger that facilitates the process of recording transactions and tracking assets in a business network. It helping to ensure that no single entity controls the database.
home.ethereum_label: Contract built on one of the most groundbreaking and scalable ecosystems in the world.
home.community_label: CAW is by design without design, and it is up the CAWMmunity to shape CAW.
home.social_eco_label_3: Financial technology based on secure distributed ledgers.
home.social_eco_label_4: Active burns and rewards for all caw's stakers

access_page.message: You need to mint your username as a NFT before joining the revolution.

minting_page.title: Mint your username
minting_page.message: Mint your username and join the revølution
minting_page.step_title: First step is to connect your
minting_page.step_description: Minting an NFT username is the new way to enter to a revolutionary world.
minting_page.nft_state_a: NFT refers to a Non-Fungible Token and is a digital asset that is unique and stored on a blockchain that allows for the secure transfer of ownership of digital assets.
minting_page.nft_state_ai: Ownership of an NFT username will provide access to the associated account.
minting_page.username_invalid: username must be : alphanumeric, lowercase, no spaces, non special characters
minting_page.owneraddress_label: Will be owned by this address
minting_page.press_bnt_action_label: Press the button below to mint your NFT
minting_page.wizard_step1_lb1: All user activity, social and financial flows through your NFT username
minting_page.wizard_step1_lb2: A wallet can own several usernames
minting_page.wizard_step1_lb3: You can mint as many as you can afford
minting_page.caw_balance_req_lb: You need to have enough mCAW to mint a username. You can mint mCAW here :
minting_page.user_acceptance_title: Before continuing, you should know and accept the following
minting_page.user_acceptance_warn_1: I am responsible for my own funds
minting_page.user_acceptance_warn_2: I am responsible for my username and its actions
minting_page.user_acceptance_warn_3: I will not be able to change my username later
minting_page.user_acceptance_warn_5: Power given to me, with great power comes great responsibility
minting_page.user_acceptance_warn_4: We are moving off emails and phone as a way to identify users
minting_page.confirm_mnt: Are you sure you want to mint the name : {0}?
minting_page.longerResponse: Reconnect your wallet if it takes too long to confirm the transaction
minting_page.confirmation_req: Three confirmations are required in your wallet.
